items.title: Supreme Court won’t hear Ghislaine Maxwell’s appeal
items.description: Maxwell, an imprisoned associate of deceased financier Jeffrey Epstein, has argued she was improperly prosecuted.

items.title: House Democrat from Trump district draws a liberal primary challenger
items.description: Maine state Auditor Matthew Dunlap is challenging Rep. Jared Golden in Maine, promising to “take a harder line” against President Donald Trump in the ...

items.title: Rep. Wesley Hunt joins race for Senate, seeks to shake up Texas GOP field
items.description: His decision adds a new dimension to a primary that has been centered on longtime incumbent John Cornyn and state Attorney General Ken Paxton.

items.title: David Hogg makes first midterms endorsement against an incumbent Democrat
items.description: Hogg, who gave up his position in party leadership, but had yet to make good on his promise to challenge incumbents.
